item.title: Nicholas Chang
item.description: Nicholas is a Senior Platform Engineer working at Kainos interested in learning and sharing Azure Knowledge within the community. I work with Azure, Terraform, Azure DevOps, and GitHub and am passionate about Microsoft technology. You can find me on my Twitter: @nick_cloudops or visit my blog @ nicholaschangblog.com
